content: Drink potency can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations around the game's areas. Our page has all of their locations for you.

This is an excerpt from the file 'A_Thousand_Days_Inebriation.md', within the main section titled 'A Thousand Days Inebriation'.
The content is as follows:
Drink potency can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations around the game's areas. Our page has all of their locations for you.
